DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : - To correlate severity retinal arteriolar narrow microvascular change , determine retinal photograph video imaging , measure coronary microvascular function woman evaluate chest pain . - To evaluate measure vascular compliance applanation tonometry photoplethysmography use nasal alar probe .
DOC.brief_title: WISE ARIC : Retinal Photography Women With Chest Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Women meet study eligibility criterion provide write informed consent baseline physical exam , include measurement heart rate , blood pressure , weight . Medical history update , specifically cardiovascular event ( hospitalization , procedure ) since last contact current medication . Patients schedule retinal photography . Those currently screen qualify EWISE ancillary study retinal photography schedule close index CFR possible prior receive randomize therapy . The retinal photography follow standardize write protocol . For second protocol , 100 patient schedule appointment Eye clinic meet Women 's Ischemic Syndrome Evaluation ( WISE ) /Atherosclerosis Risk Communities ( ARIC ) staff complete baseline information brief physical examination . They provocative test complete retinal imaging .
DOC.criteria: Women participate screened WISE EWISE ancillary study Willing provide write informed consent Have record measurement coronary flow reserve , without obstructive coronary disease Unwilling complete study require procedure Contraindication adenosine
